name: NOT Oracle of Seasons
description:
Built with GameMaker Studio 2. I followed Shaun Spalding's YouTube tutorial on how to make a Zelda-like ARPG, but I put some more emphasis on "Zelda-like".

Sprites used were ripped by:

  • Darth RPG
  • Red Mage Moogle
  • Mister Mike
  • Tails585
  • Reptile
  • BigG

Audio supplied by HelpTheWretched (HTW) at www.ZeldaSounds.com
